job_purpose: Designing, implementing, and maintaining robust, scalable backend software for a next-generation fleet management and autonomy solution.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design and implement backend services, APIs, and behaviors meeting functional and non-functional requirements
Lead technical execution of complex user stories from design to deployment
Contribute to technical design reviews and provide feedback on system architecture
Ensure code quality through peer reviews, automated testing, and documentation
Improve codebase maintainability through refactoring, observability, and test coverage enhancements
Mentor junior developers on patterns, practices, and software design paradigms
Collaborate with Domain Engineers to integrate shared frameworks and libraries
Escalate technical risks or misalignments to the Tech Lead
required_qualifications: Proven 5+ years' experience as a Software Developer or similar role
Experience with C# .NET Core, Entity Framework, RabbitMQ
Experience with microservice architectures and containerization using Docker or Kubernetes
company_details: Brunel is a recruitment and flexible workforce solution provider connecting talented people with opportunities in Australasia and globally. They specialize in highly skilled roles across technical, professional, trades, and craft disciplines.
